pullRequest.title: APPSERV-32 Payara Enterprise Branding
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Adds Enterprise branding to the admin console.
Also fixes some of the old branding gradients we had on the shutdown page.
Important Info
The branding will only show up if building using the enterprise profile:
mvn clean install -Penterprise
The enterprise classifier being added to the woodstock-suntheme artefact is a workaround until we extricate all of the branding and theme specific stuff from this external artefact (or we come up with a more elegant solution).
Dependant PRs
Woodstock Suntheme "Maven-isation": payara/patched-src-woodstock-suntheme#16
Woodstock Suntheme: payara/patched-src-woodstock-suntheme#17
Blockers
Release of new woodstock-suntheme versions to Payara Patched_Projects.
Testing
New tests
None
Testing Performed
Built the server using the enterprise profile, and then poked around the admin console, making sure to hit:

Admin Console loading page (just after domain start and before it asks for login details)
Login page (doesn't show unless you change the admin password)
Admin Console splash (top-left corner)
About popup window
Shutdown page
Restart page

Built the server again without the enterprise profile and poked around the same pages to ensure everything reverted back to normal branding.
Test suites executed
Build tests and quicklook against "normal" and "enterprise" builds
Testing Environment
Zulu JDK 8u242 on Windows 10 with Maven 3.6.3 - Microsoft Edge (new version)
Documentation
None
Notes for Reviewers
Make sure you build using the enterprise profile to see the new changes!
Also probably worth clearing your browser's image cache.
Pages with branding that I've found/checked:

Admin Console loading page (just after domain start and before it asks for login details)
Login page (doesn't show unless you change the admin password)
Admin Console splash (top-left corner)
About popup window
Shutdown page
Restart page

commit.message: APPSERV-32 Initial theme creation and packaging changes
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/payara/Payara into APPSERV-32

APPSERV-32 Account for jar name change in sun-web.xml
